_sName: Reworked NAV File for Map CS_BACKALLEY2
_sText:
This is a reworked NAV file for cs_backalley2 brought to you by BigDog. You can find the map here: MAP

The autogenerted NAV file that came with the map was horrible and I felt I had to do this awesome remake justice by adding what was missing from it to make for a decent experience with NPC players.

The navigation mesh is fully place painted as usual according to the names of locations taken right from the classic cs_backalley for CS 1.6/CZ.

Note: at first bots may seem silent, but that tends to happen on maps with no radar. Don't worry- they're using names of locations just fine. Also sometimes bots might get stuck in vents, because they're dumb :D . I did all I could to minimize that, while keeping those vents usable by them, as it was in the original map.
